name: part_003
file: tmp_【 ごちそうさまでした 】沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブ【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [F9lbxgimNIE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Chloe Sakamata performs 'Our Bright Parade' solo on stage.
Transition with audience shots and intro music for the next song.
Chloe Sakamata, Pekora Usada, and Suisei Hoshimachi perform 'Ano Band'.

subtitles.original: Our Bright Parade
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade

subtitles.original: 今日は ほら 笑顔さ
subtitles.english: Today, see, I'm smiling

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, I'm going to shine

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも 連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring your regrets and your love along

subtitles.original: 駆け抜け羽ばたけ 飛び出すのさ
subtitles.english: Run through, spread your wings, and fly out

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光 終わりなき日差し
subtitles.english: A modest prayer is the light, an endless sunshine

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと 胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: Finding you is something I can be proud of

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade

subtitles.original: まだ 頼りない予感を
subtitles.english: Still, a faint premonition

subtitles.original: 歌おう 恥ずかしくなってないよ
subtitles.english: Let's sing it, I'm not embarrassed

subtitles.original: 誰も解けないイマジナリー
subtitles.english: An imaginary world no one can solve

subtitles.original: いつか また会えるおまじない
subtitles.english: A spell so we can meet again someday

subtitles.original: あの日 ゼロに始まったストーリー
subtitles.english: A story that started from zero that day

subtitles.original: 数えきれない言の葉 数えるような思いじゃないさ
subtitles.english: Uncountable words, it's not a feeling you can count

subtitles.original: ほら 今 僕ら ひとつと呼ぼう
subtitles.english: Look, now, let's call ourselves one

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 美しいんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, it's beautiful

subtitles.original: 許しあえる切な夜は 煌めく
subtitles.english: The painful nights where we can forgive each other sparkle

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ また遠い空
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, once again the distant sky

subtitles.original: 相応しい旅路とは 君と歩くことさ
subtitles.english: The right journey is walking with you

subtitles.original: 君と歩くことなんだ
subtitles.english: Walking with you

subtitles.original: 「ただいま」を聞けば 「おかえり」って叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: If I hear 'I'm home', I'll shout 'Welcome back'

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because it's not something to take for granted

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, I'm going to shine

subtitles.original: 暗がりを満たすのは 君だ 僕だ
subtitles.english: Filling the darkness is you, it's me

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Pare-pare-pare, I'm going to shine

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも 連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring your regrets and your love along

subtitles.original: 駆け抜け羽ばたけ 飛び出すのさ
subtitles.english: Run through, spread your wings, and fly out

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光 終わりなき日差し
subtitles.english: A modest prayer is the light, an endless sunshine

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでゆく 素敵のスタートさ
subtitles.english: Jumping in with you is a wonderful start

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade
subtitles.english: From here, from now on, Our Bright Parade

subtitles.original: Our Bright Parade
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade

subtitles.original: あのバンド
subtitles.english: Ano Band

subtitles.original: あのバンドの歌は私に
subtitles.english: The songs of that band...

subtitles.original: わかっていたけど響く 笑い声聞こえる
subtitles.english: ...to me, I knew it, they resonate, I can hear the laughter

subtitles.original: あのバンドの歌は私には
subtitles.english: The songs of that band, to me...

subtitles.original: つんざく 踏切の音みたい
subtitles.english: ...they're piercing, like the sound of a railroad crossing

subtitles.original: 背中を 押すなよ
subtitles.english: Don't push my back

subtitles.original: もうそこに 電車が来る
subtitles.english: The train is coming there already

subtitles.original: 目を閉じる
subtitles.english: I close my eyes

subtitles.original: 暗闇に差す 後光
subtitles.english: A halo shining in the darkness

subtitles.original: 耳塞ぐ
subtitles.english: I cover my ears

subtitles.original: 確かに刻む 鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeat surely ticking

subtitles.original: 胸の奥
subtitles.english: Deep in my chest

subtitles.original: 身を震わす 心臓
subtitles.english: My heart is trembling

subtitles.original: 他に何も 聞きたくない 私が放つ 音以外
subtitles.english: I don't want to hear anything else, except for the sound I release

subtitles.original: 虚像に 居場所探したり
subtitles.english: Searching for a place in false images

subtitles.original: 悲しい歌に 救われていたんだけど
subtitles.english: I was saved by sad songs, but...

subtitles.original: あのバンドの歌が誰かには
subtitles.english: The songs of that band, for someone...

subtitles.original: 私だけが 間違いばかりみたい
subtitles.english: It's like only I am full of mistakes

subtitles.original: 目を閉じる
subtitles.english: I close my eyes

subtitles.original: 暗闇に差す 後光
subtitles.english: A halo shining in the darkness

subtitles.original: 耳塞ぐ
subtitles.english: I cover my ears

subtitles.original: 確かに刻む 鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeat surely ticking

subtitles.original: 胸の奥
subtitles.english: Deep in my chest

subtitles.original: 身を揺らす 心臓
subtitles.english: My heart is trembling
